segue_dave.line: Dead Kennedys broke up in 1986, while Elton John's "It's Me That You Need" was released by DJM Records, a record label which dissolved in the same year...
segue_dave.explanation: Dead Kennedys was formed as a band in 1986 and Elton John's "Empty Sky" was released by DJM Records, a record label that stop existing in the same year.
